name: Bloom (Canceled)
blurb: Bloom is a beautiful fantasy action adventure game with a dose of RPG elements for PC, Mac, Linux, OUYA, and Xbox 360.

rewards.reward: ~~ Treasure Seed Collector ~~\r\n\r\nExplanation of this tier in the updates section ~~

Founder - Welcome to the first tier. Everyone who donates will never be forgotten as their names grace the walls of our studio as a founder. Every day we will be reminded who made Bloom possible and for whom we are creating games at all. In addition, you will also find your names immortalized in the game itself (and in every future game of the Bloom series) in a secret area telling of an ancient people which made the very world possible (and, of course, the secret area will have plenty of valuable relics of the past, making it sought out by all who play the game). \r\n\r\nYou will also be granted a special Founder title when our forums go up...  letting others know you were part of things from the beginning.

Into the World - All previous tier rewards AND a digital download of the game when it is released (PC , Mac, xbox or any additional platforms which may be added in the future). You will also get a special in-game care package filled with items (including an enchanted map to help you find your way) which will definitely come in handy as you play.

Digital Collector - All previous tier rewards AND a digital download of both a special Kickstarter only art book and game soundtrack! This way when you aren't playing, you can listen to the music while looking at the artwork and imagine you are playing :)

Secrets of Power -  All previous tier rewards AND a signed poster which not only displays a beautiful piece of concept art, but also contains a clue to a valuable secret inside the game. Also, you will receive a special in-game amulet which contains the power to attract small animals (which will definitely come in handy). ((Please include an additional 5 dollars for shipping))

Founding Architect - All previous tier rewards AND a special Bloom T shirt (available in standard sizes). You also become a "Founding Architect", with your name placed into a reserved section on the studio walls, game shrine, AND into the game credits! You will also be placed into a special pool from which historic characters and references will be pulled and appear throughout the game! ((Please include a total of an additional 10 dollars for shipping))

Insider - All previous tier rewards AND a behind the scenes signed art book! This won't just be filled with great concept art for the game, but will also walk you through the very first designs and how the game has really evolved over time. The book will also give you an inside look on how the game was created and what types of choices needed to be made along the way (such as choosing an engine and limitations of different visual styles). ((Please include a total of an additional 20 dollars for shipping))

Founding Sentry - All previous tier reward AND you become a "Founding Sentry" ! Again, your name will be moved to a more selective portion of the studio wall of names, game shrine, AND in the game credits. In addition, your name (or a name you choose) will appear in the game as a re-animated character! You will be able to help craft the history of the character and its unique story to tell. ((Please include a total of an additional 20 dollars for shipping of previous rewards))

Ancient Founder - All previous tier rewards AND you receive a small 3d printed model (the kind used in the game industry for prototyping!). You will be able to select from a variety of models and materials as these are produced one at a time, special for you. \r\n\r\nNext, you move up to become an "Ancient Founder"! Instead of the character before, your name will appear as one of the few true survivors from long ago (not just reanimated, you will have found immortality!). The character will be an unbeatable enemy OR a mysterious ally that appears some point in the game . You will also be given a "Glimpse of the Past" ability upon character creation, allowing you to revisit the past in a special portion of the game from the point of view of your Ancient Founders life long ago!  ((Please include a total of an additional 25 dollars for shipping of previous rewards))

Insider Tome - All previous tier rewards AND the behind the scenes art book from before is replaced by a signed special HARD COVERED extended behind the scenes art book! This will include part of the original graphic novel that inspired the world of Bloom today and truly be an epic collectors item. You also receive 10 digital download copies of the game to hand out to your friends. ((Please include a total of an additional 25 dollars for shipping of previous rewards))
Portrait Patron - All previous tier rewards AND a one of a kind signed portrait of YOU made by our artist!  ((Please include a total of an additional 25 dollars for shipping of previous rewards))

Part of the Family - All previous tier rewards AND you become part of the Studio Fawn family. You obviously believe a great deal in the game and studio! So, you and your guests are welcome to come down and visit us at the studio for a behind the scenes tour (and we will take you to lunch). After that, well, we definitely would love to keep hearing from you (have ideas for the game? Want to talk about game development? Or maybe just want personal updates on how things are going or what ideas we are trying to sort out?). Really, it is up to you how active you want to be in the process :) Let us know if there is something else you would like here, just drop us a line before you donate and we can chat :)
